document_title: What disease causes dizziness when lying down? Causes and treatments
subsection_name: nam-xuong-bi-chong-mat.json_7_How to limit dizziness when lying down
subsection_content:
What should you do to prevent dizziness when lying down? Some measures can be applied such as:
Do not change position suddenly. It's best to make gradual changes, whether from sitting to lying down or vice versa. Even when lying down, if you want to turn your body to one side, you should do it slowly so your body can adapt.; Do not use alcohol and stimulants; Have a healthy and scientific diet. Drink lots of water, don't eat salty foods. Eat lots of vegetables and fruits. Supplement vitamins and nutrients; Live and rest in moderation, avoid staying up late or overworking.
The phenomenon of dizziness when lying down can come from many different causes. Therefore, if patients have symptoms of illness, they should not be subjective or self-treat at home. Go to a reputable medical facility so that a doctor can examine and diagnose your health condition.
